thread.title: Catherine Tresa to play a MLA with Allu Arjun
thread.title_full: Catherine Tresa to play a MLA with Allu Arjun - The Times of India

author: Pranita Jonnalagedda
title: Catherine Tresa to play a MLA with Allu Arjun
text:
After news of Catherine Tresa's casting opposite Allu Arjun in the upcoming action entertainer directed by Boyapati Srinu breaking, it has now emerged that Catherine isn't going to be playing just eye-candy like she did in Iddarammayilatho, her previous outing with the stylish star.
Catherine will play a politician, says a source in the film's unit saying, "Her role will be the surprise package in the movie. It's a very interesting role that will have her playing a hard-nosed MLA. It's a very important part of the film and director Boyapati felt that she would be perfect for the role."
Now that's going to be something to look forward to â€”- Catherine, the MLA. Touted to be a mass entertainer, the film features Rakul Preet Singh as the female lead.
